Class CountDownTimer

  • java.lang.Object
    • project1.CountDownTimer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<CountDownTimer>

    public class CountDownTimer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<CountDownTimer>

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int hours
      Hours to start countdown at
      private int minutes
      Minutes to start countdown at
      private int seconds
      Seconds to start countdown at
      private static boolean susFlag
      Controls external access to timer manipulation When true: all timer manipulation is suspended When false: manipulation allowed

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CountDownTimer()
      Constructs a CountDownTimer with a start time of 0
      CountDownTimer(int seconds)
      Constructs a CountDownTimer with the provided start time Implied time format is "s"
      CountDownTimer(int minutes, int seconds)
      Constructs a CountDownTimer with the provided start time Implied time format is "mm:ss"
      CountDownTimer(int hours, int minutes, int seconds)
      Constructs a CountDownTimer with the provided start time Implied time format is "h:mm:ss"
      CountDownTimer(java.lang.String startTime)
      Constructs a CountDownTimer with the start time provided in string format Accepted formats are as follows: h:mm:ss - calls CountDownTimer(int, int, int) mm:ss - calls CountDownTimer(int, int) s - calls CountDownTimer(int) [blank] - calls CountDownTimer()

      • CountDownTimer

        public CountDownTimer(int hours,
                      int minutes,
                      int seconds)
               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Constructs a CountDownTimer with the provided start time Implied time format is "h:mm:ss"
        Parameters:
        hours - Hours from 0 to start from
        minutes - Minutes from 0 to start from
        seconds - Seconds from 0 to start from
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when minutes and/or seconds are not within range [0, 59]

      • CountDownTimer

        public CountDownTimer(java.lang.String startTime)
        Constructs a CountDownTimer with the start time provided in string format Accepted formats are as follows: h:mm:ss - calls CountDownTimer(int, int, int) mm:ss - calls CountDownTimer(int, int) s - calls CountDownTimer(int) [blank] - calls CountDownTimer()
        Parameters:
        startTime - Formatted string of the start time
